How to Play:

Move: WASD and arrow keys

confirm: Space

Back: B

You can control player walk in the town and field, battle with trainers and wild Pokemon. Gain exp every time winning a battle. Level up your pokemon and study new moves when reaching a certain level. The different move has different effects based on the type of move and target Pokemon.
